content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on the back porch while i had a cigar.  i told her that i felt as if something was coming as i looked at the stars and satellites that flew by.  i told her i felt it in the pit of my stomach.  she then noticed a pulsating light in the north that seemed to circle over the city of grants pass.  this light remained steady except for a bright pulsating light that emanated from it.  no matter where it went it stayed constant and pulsing.  after it circled in the north, it slowly went east and disappeared over the mountains.  during this time, after we were deciding that this looked highly unsual and compared it to a couple jets flying overhead, we decided to get our little digital camera that can take movies.  what i caught on camera was completely different than what we saw.  at 7 secs & 34 secs white lights flash around the screen that we did not see at the time.  we were also both stumped as to why we didnt see the pulsating light in the sky at the time on the camera.  in the video there is a constant red light which is from a radio tower on the eastern mountains.  we didnt get a closer shot of this thing because we wanted to make sure it was truly unusual before we got over-excited. there was no noise from this light either and it couldn't have been more than a mile or so away from us.  i am still in a bit of shock as to my feelings that came just before we saw this thing and am a bit shaky.  my dog even was attentive to it and had her ears perked straight up.  i am including a pic of my dog, a movie, and a very grainy pic that i use on "pic" mode.  on the picture there is a a white-yellow light matching what we saw at the bottom of the picture.  the movie is different from the picture and i dont know why.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating light in the north that circled and then moved east.

content.detailedDescription: As i often do, i spent the evening playing video games between the hours of 12am and 4am.  i am also a smoker, but i do not smoke inside my house.  at approximately 3:30 am i stepped out on my back patio (which faces south) to smoke a cigarette.  it is a ritual for me to locate the moon and venus in the southern sky as soon as i step outside.  when i lit my cigarette, there was nothing unusual to report.  after about 3-4 minutes, i bent down to put out my cigarette.  when i stood back up, something caused me to look up again.  at this time, venus was hanging low to the southwest.  the moon was a little higher in the sky, and positioned east of venus.  further east of the moon, and directly south of my point of view and a little higher in the sky than the moon were two brilliantly bright lights sitting one above the other.  they were bright white (brighter than venus) and appeared to be a great distance away (possibly in outside our atmosphere).  for the time i observed them they were completely static in the sky.  they did not move in relation to objects on the ground, the stars in the sky, or in relation to each other.  they lights did not twinkle or change color or change in brightness.  it was a clear night with no clouds as all other stars were visible.  i watched the two objects for about two minutes.  then without moving, they faded from the sky in about 10-15 seconds.  they faded away at the same rate at the same time.  the fading can be described as if they moved behind progressively thickening clouds.  however there were no clouds and other dimmer stars in the same area were still visible.  the only logical explanation i can come up with is that the two objects were indeed above our atmosphere, and as i watched they passed into earth's shadow, thereby disappearing.  i stayed looking at the same spot in the sky for about ten minutes hoping the lights would reappear.  they did not, and i have not seen anything remotely similar in the southern sky at anytime of night.  as i viewed the objects i felt only intrigue and curiosity.  after they disappeared i felt a great deal of uncertainty, but not fear.  that is the extent of my story.  if anybody else saw anything similar on 8-11-09, i would love to hear about it.
content.summary: Two bright lights (brighter than venus) that disappeared within a few minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on my deck overlooking downtown to my south. saw a bright object moving from east to west approx. 10 degrees above horizon. the fast speed & brightness of object caught my eye. it stopped suddenly & made a dirrect turn upward then disapeared over norad. it made no sound & just disapeared in a clear night. i knew immediately it was a ufo as i've had many sightings since moving to colorado springs 27 yrs ago. i came back into my house to get my binoculars, but was unable to find anything like it in the night sky. the moon was setting approx.1:30 o'clock. jupiter was rising approx.10:00 o'clock. this object was about 4 times larger then jupiter & brighter then the moon. 
the sighting did not disturb me as i've had other sightings throughout colorado. did get my roommate when i got my binoculars hoping for a second opinion but the sky was devoid of anything that big & bright.
content.summary: Round, bright, larger then jupiter, about the size of my thumb nail

content.detailedDescription:
While driving to selmer,tn one summer day in 2003, my daughter,granddaughter and i saw 

the most remarkable thing...We were traveling west on hwy 64 when my daughter,who was the one driving

saw a flash,  she looked up and saw in the distance, what appeared to be a huge metalic inverted v type  craft

just hoovering in place above the road...It was a good ways down the road, 

hard to determine distance. but we were traveling on a typical west tn. road that everything trees, sky etc can be seen for miles so as she was busy driving and 

glancing up from moment to moment, i was watching it constantly to see if it 

did anything interesting like take off at super sonic speed...It just 

continued to hang..As we drove towards it,as we got closer it seemed to kind of dissolve, to 

blur around the edges, which were more defined before it seemed to me...As we neared 

selmer and we were approaching under where i guessed the object to be i looked up to see if i could still see it but it
seemed to have 
 gone... i continued to try to relocate the craft, if that's what 

it was,but it was gone...We were so excited we discussed it, ad nauseum all 

the way thru the store and back home again...To the best of my memory this is exactly how it happened :)
content.summary: An silverish inverted v hoovering above the road on hwy 64 w..

content.detailedDescription:
My dogs were stirring around 4 a.M. which ussally means they had to go out.  i let the dogs out, not paying much attention to my surroundings. i then look out to the west. there's a tree line about 300 hundred yards from my home. i suddenly see a perfectly round amber colored object just hanging there, just slightly below the tree line. i would venture to say that it was the size of a small car.  it wasn't small. it didn't move either, it just hung there. it quickly got my attention; trying to discern what it could be. i quickly ruled out the moon or a street lap since it was above the tree line. it was not a solid amber color. there were some darker shades along the edges.  of course, i kept telling myself, it was my imagination. but when i looked back up it was still there. it hung there for about 5-minutes, without moving. i turned around and let my dogs back inside. when i turned back around from inside the house, it gone.

last week i took some digital photos of the tree line from my house, with the intention of drawing the object.  if you're interested in these, let me know and i will forward. i've been procrastinating.
content.summary: Round, amber colored object above a tree line. it was stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I was living in bristol uk at the time and working on the construction of a new gas turbine power station. 

i arrived home around 6pm from work, i had brought a powerful torch previously that week and decided to go into the back garden to test it out.  i was with my stepson at the time who was about 7 years old, anyway i was using the torch all over the garden and then started reflecting the light beam off the scattered clouds (it was a very clear night with broken clouds) i was making patterns in the sky like number shapes circles, squares and triangles etc.. then my stepson said 'whats that there'? he was pointing at a cloud directly above us and then what looked like a hole forming in the middle of this cloud.

we were both fascinated by what we saw next, it was a black triangle shape that was slowly rotating in an anticlockwise direction, i would estimate the height around 1000-1500 feet.  i flashed the torch at this object a few times end then, i can only describe what happened like this.. imagine a stack of casino chips and you where looking at them from underneath, maybe you can only see one right?  well at first we thought that there was only one of theses objects but then others began pealing off from above this object all of the same shape and size from our perspective. (there were about +50 in my estimation)

these objects then incredibly, shot across the sky in our complete view and made the shape of the number 7 but with the strike in it, they then made a square shape and others.
there was no light from theses objects but they were distinct in shape and colour-black, a black that stood out from the night sky.
whilst we were watching this amazing sight i noticed that all the wind chimes in neighbouring gardens were sounding quite loudly and dogs started barking.

the next thing that happened i had an urge to look to my right, above me i estimate 100-150 feet one of these objects was just rotating there completely silent. (it was massive! aprox the size of a 747x2)
i must admit that when i saw this and my stepson also saw it i was afraid i can't describe the exact feeling except i think it was the fear of the unknown!  we both at that point ran inside the house and locked the door.

about 10 minutes later i went back outside and there was no sign of these mysterious triangular objects, i was glad but also sad at the same time if that makes sence because i really wanted to know what they were.

after that incident i only told my parents and close family, but even they thought i must have had one to many! i tell you no lie this happened and i can even draw the whole thing as from start to finish it is that clear in my mind even after all this time.

i never reported the objects because as i'm sure you are well aware of the stigma attached to such reporting of these sightings but, i am so pleased to be able to report to you and maybe this information will be useful in some way to others studying this phenomenon.

i just have to say that i have no reason to lie or exaggerate what i saw that night, i seek no reward or fame, i also just want to know the truth about these objects that are the skies above us.
content.summary: Black triangles rotating in the sky then forming shapes

content.detailedDescription:
So i started out by jogging down brousseau ave in timmins ontario.  as i crossed the mclean intersection heading west i happened to look up quickly.  i thought i seen something shiny in the sky so i took a second glance.  i stopped jogging to steady my vision.  it seemed to be hovering from north to south.  it was moving very slowly and did not make a sound. although it was at least 1000 feet up and maybe a mile away.  usually even a plane will make that kind of noise, especially the small prop planes that leave our airport.  the other thing that got me thinking that it wasnt a plane was the fact that it did not appear to be landing or taking off.  it was very bright and shiny.  i found it odd that when i took my sunglasses off i could hardly see it.  it had more of a brightness with my sunglasses on.  it was cigar shaped but oval at the same time.  it did not change shape, it was just in between.  i looked down to my cell phone to activate the camera in it.  as soon as i went to point it to take the picture the object disappeared.  immediately after this i knew it wasnt a conventional aircraft.  it was something else.  i scanned the whole sky immediately after and it was no where to be seen.  i have had a few odd sightings here in timmins but nothing odd enough to report.  i hope you get more on this.  please email me if anyone else has reported anything in my area!

thanks

dave
content.summary: Shiny silver object

content.detailedDescription:
Watching air traffic from my yard looking south at 12:30 p.M, wednesday, august 24, 2009. location: la mesa, ca. we live under the flight paths for lindbergh field in san diego and always have commercial jets overhead. i'm familiar with the landing patterns for both lindbergh and tijuana international having lived in this location for twenty-five years.

observed what i thought was a white commercial jet moving southeast. based on my judgment of international border location and distance and height of object, it was flying from u.S. into mexico at a shallow angle. at first thought it was heading for tijuana international but realized it was too high. it also wasn't in the usual landing pattern for lindbergh field in san diego. as i kept watching, a bright flash enveloped the object for less than a second and then it was no longer there.

weather condition: blue sky, no clouds. i considered possibility of sun reflection on tail section, but that didn't explain disappearance. also, sun angle (almost directly overhead) made sun reflection unlikely. i also considered the plane descending and turning, but it was moving in a straight line heading southeast when the flash happened.
content.summary: White fuselage traveling southeast disappeared in bright flash

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding in my father's truck, on the way to bring my boyfriend home. driving along, up in the sky i noticed a very bright ball, bigger than the stars. it was blinking a bit, like a plane at night, but i couldn't make out any shape, and it didn't appear to be moving. as the truck got closer, there was a moment where the object went out of sight, and i looked out the back window hoping to get a better view, but it was gone. it must have disappeared when it went out of sight over the truck, so i didn't see how it disappeared. 

no one else appeared to notice it, and i didn't give the object much thought until it disappeared. by then, i felt weird mentioning it, so i just kept quiet. 

when i arrived home, there was another bright flash in the sky like a beam of light, and that is the extent of my sighting.
content.summary: Very bright object disappeared, flash in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: while having a cigerette outside the college,observed intense ball of light over stephenville airport. it appeared to be about 5 or 6 kms away and about 2kms high. the object just kinda floated in the sky but would disappear and reappear in different locations.It was also fading and brightening as it did this. at one point it started to get extremely bright and my first thoughts were that something was about to happen, but it just went back to being dull again.This light did not appear to be a spacecraft, in my opinion it seemed to be alive by the way it moved around in the sky, it seemed like it knew i was lookin at it.Eventually the object dimmed out as it had been doing and never came back.
content.summary: Intense ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being made by state section director, barbard delozier.  witness has asked to remain anonymous.  incident was reported to delozier by witness, who is personally known by delozier to be an upstanding citizen in the community and a very credible witness.  witness described occurrence as follows:

witness walks through his quiet neighborhood every night before retiring. sometimes, his wife walks with him.  on monday, august 24, 2009, he was by himself.  

witness was walking near brake park in the highlandview section of port saint joe at approximately 10:30 pm.  out of the corner of his eye, he 'thought' he saw a low flying plane approaching him from the south east.  witness looked in the direction the object was coming from at a very high rate of speed and realized that it was not a plane at all.  the object stopped abruptly about 75' away from him, and about 100' above the tops of the trees (approx. 150-200' in the air).  object stayed there long enough for witness to get a good description of it before it took off in what he described as a 'nano-second ... just poof disappeared' in the same direction it was originally heading from southeast to northwest.

he said that object was much larger than an aspirin held at arms length and was larger than a mini-van.

witness desbribed the object to look 'like a mini-van without wheels' with three floor to ceiling windows.  there were lights in the windows, the middle light/window being the brightest.  no sounds were heard, no beings were seen.  he did not report lost time.  no physical manifestations were visible on his face or arms, and he acknowledged that he did not see any bruises, blood spots or injuries to his body after the incident.  witness also said that he was not bothered by loss of sleep or strange dreams, so far.

witness reported that he has never, ever believed in ufos and has never, ever seen anything like this before.

witness made a drawing of the object he saw, which is attached to this report.
content.summary: Large object came up quickly, stopped abruptly, then took off

content.detailedDescription: We were at an outdoor even at the stir concert cove at harrah's casino.  looking to the north at about a 60 degree angle was a large round amber light in the clear sky.  it was much, much larger than a star.  it did not appear to move.  it was at a pretty high altitude and look fairly far away.  i was altered to the light from others in the audience who where pointing at it as well.  there is an airport in the area, but it was certainly not a plain.  the amber light in the sky was much bigger than standard aircraft lights or landing lights.  i didn't see the object fly away.  i remember looking at it twice about 15 seconds apart.  then a third look a few minutes later and it was gone.  not sure if it was in nebraska or iowa.  really right along the missouri river.
content.summary: Fairly large round, amber light at a pretty high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in our backyard smoking a cigaret looking at the stars and turned and noticed themin thesky.Din't know what they were.There was a long bright white line in the sky with 2 misshapen circular orange pink objects on the side of the white line. we were surprized and didn't know what to think. the objects were one long, about 7 or8 feet long bright white line in the sky with 2 orange pink misshapen circular objects on the side of the line. they didn't move for about an hour just stayed the same. we had gone in and out of the house twice and they were still there in the same place when we came back out each time. some very light clounds passed over the objects but you could still see them through the clouds.The last time we came out of the house to look they were gone.The pink orangeobjects were glowy.

thank you for your time. i was hoping you could have an idea what they were.

sincerely

arne & paula heyntsen
content.summary: Long bright white line with 2 orange pink misshapen circles

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture, as i like to do, and so did i this afternoon, of this  fence, and when i checked how the photo came, i saw this white line with a kind of circle and a thing around. i dosen���t seem to be coming from the ground, and it can���t be a plain either. as the photo isn���t the sharp when zooming in, it is hard to say what it is really. i didn���t change anything on the photograph, i never do, i always keep my photos in the original as they have been taken.
content.summary: I had only discoverd it after having checked my picture i had just taken
content.locationName: St. Peter Port - Guernsey, St Peter Port

content.detailedDescription: August 23,at about 11:30 in the evening i was sitting outside and watching stars. i was looking to the north star,and suddenly,about south west from that star,something flashed really hard and it flashed my eyes. first,i thought its just a something flashing in my eyes,but then i looked to that star,and it flashed again like a camera flash. any idea on you think it is? maybe there was 2 meteors crashing to each other? and then,i looked above me,to the milky way core,and i saw something like a bullet or so.
content.summary: It happened really fast

content.detailedDescription:
Same flight path as other sightings--coming from easterly direction from pa turnpike area 1/4 mile away.  flew over famous oakmont country club golf course as viewed from across the allegheny river 2000 feet away.  multicolored flashing lights, flying too low for any plane, totally silent.
skimming the tops and even flying behind the treeline.

when over the golf course low, it turned on only 3 white lights to reveal that it is same triangle craft filmed in murrysville on july 16th and august 4th.  after it came out of trees, it turned them off and put back on the "fake plane" lights, multiple colored and flashing to try and blend in as one of 'ours'.

it crossed over the allegheny river just made it over the treeline on ridge on other side of river.

here are some shots of before it did the triangle light thing with some weird structures, plus the nightshot view of it with the triangle light formation (note the center upper light appears to be 2 separate lights--this is seen in july 16th triangle ufo sighting also).

i feel they are interested in our progress of the pa turnpike reconstruction and the building of a new "cutting edge design" bridge over the river.  both this location and murrysville, pa is close to the pa turnpike.  i just hope they observe the "no fly zone" over pittsburgh during the g-20 summit next month!  could get ugly if they don't.

the hd video of it flying can be seen on my youtube channel:  seeingufospa
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=jgsn29reqls
content.summary: Harmar(ville): 3 light triangle over oakmont country club

content.detailedDescription:
Filmed either night of meteor shower (12th) or the next night.
unmounted clover hdc501 surveillance cam recording various places (where i aim it) recording in ep (low quality mode) for 6 hours to a dvd recorder.  the cam was sitting on a ladder on my deck outside facing south.  jupiter is visible in the shot on the left side.

what it picked up that was not visible to the naked eye in darkness is what appears to be a crescent shaped ufo that suddenly appears in the right side of the screen.  this would place it within the 500 foot circumference of the valley in front of my house.  bugs, a bat and numerous other things seen flying too.  

then, something cloudlike swoops down from above and goes into it.  it then vanishes, right on the spot.  

the shutter speed is not at 30 fps and so detail of that cloud isn't the best. reminds me, though, of the possible "sky critter" brown cloud in the august 17th chase video.  i wonder if these 'clouds' contain the radioactive radon gas that is so high in my area and they gather them up for fuel or ???

i have a feeling that this one is the 'bottom' of this one also photographed in westmoreland county by guy on myspace.Com 
http://viewmorepics.Myspace.Com/index.Cfm?Fuseaction=viewimage&friendid=446757377&albumid=1184142&imageid=12423343#a=1184142&i=14991713

see the video of it on youtube, channel name:  seeingufospa

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=agczktm2lvs
content.summary: Murrysville:  crescent shaped ufo caught on surveillance cam-cloaked

content.detailedDescription:
These are regularly occurring and always silent flying.  usually only what appears to be rear of a small plane is seen.  two white steady 'wing' type lights, red blinking one in the middle.  only one side strobes.  this is the clue that they aren't ours besides the silent part.

as seen on my triangle ufo video shot on july 16, 2009, the triangle turns off all lights and turns into this "fake plane" ufo as i call it.  it also shows the non-faa compliant flash pattern of only one side white light strobing.

around here they are always flying a pretty low altitude (like a cessna would) and slow.  they sometimes have other lights on them that usually don't stay on all the time too.

the ones in this picture show a similar structure under the red light that is visible on close ups of the larger triangle ufos under the red light.  not known if this is same craft or a smaller version.

one picture shows hook-like appendage under the red light's holding structure
that is level with the ground, not tilted as the white lights are.

hd video i put together of multiple sightings of this kind and also showing it retrieving an orb (or probe?) is on my youtube channel name:  seeingufospa
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=hg6ykfn5px4

also the video shows footage from local guy who filmed where they are probably coming from (shot in my direction too).
content.summary: Murrysville:  "fake plane" ufos regularly seen - one retrieved an orb

content.detailedDescription:
12:15am - i nicknamed this one the "flying choo choo" because of the lighting pattern from the side.  same flight path e to w approximately as july 23rd sighting.  coming from direction of pa turnpike over famous oakmont country club golf course as viewed across the river 2000 feet away.

as you can see from the pictures, it changes shape like june 16th ufo that didn't show up on radar report.  especially the 'tail' section (wish i could upload more pictures to show you-but limited to 3). ended up looking more like a flat rectangle as it when out of view across the allegheny river heading west or wsw.  pretty low, i might add as there's a ridge on that side it would be low as it crossed it if going the same altitude.
the 2 white lights close together (on tope) are similar to the other triangle ufos' middle light on ones i've filmed and so i think they are related (same manufacturer).

hd video is uploaded to youtube on my channel:  seeingufospa
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=d5nnuipkukw



p.S. aaahhhhh!  your sighting report still errors out when you pick 00 hours (midnight) for sighting time and you have to start all over again!  fix it!
content.summary: Harmar(ville):  strange morphing triangle/rectangle over oakmont country club

content.detailedDescription:
Similar flight path as june 16, 2009 sighting and side lighting appearance from 2000 feet away across the allegheny river.  coming from direction of pa turnpike quarter a mile away (se).  flew over famous oakmont country club golf course and headed across river to the west approximately.

video of it flying in hd is on my youtube channel:  seeingufospa

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=vxpwa-uon5k

detail in stills on video not good so here's some posted here so others can see and compare to what they might be seeing.
these are all of the same craft.
content.summary: Harmar(ville):  strange triangle over oakmont country club

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the deck attached to my parent's home at 6 possum glen road in wantage (sussex) n.J.. i reside in the house up their driveway at 8 possum glen road. i was alone on the deck talking to an old air force friend when i saw the "lights". i first noticed the lights as i gazed into the night sky. when i first noticed the lights, i thought that it was very strange but i didn't know what they were. i knew that they were not typical aircraft.

date:  august 25, 2009 tuesday

time of initial sighting:  between 9:14 and 9:16 p.M. est

duration:  2.5 minutes

location:  less than 5 degrees above jupiter and about 1-2 degrees to right - jupiter and the objects appeared ssw from my location

number of observed objects(lights):  2

total duration of sighting:  2.5 minutes

weather/observational conditions:  clear, no wind, moonless or moon behind trees, milky way banding visible and double stars in ursa major visible to unaided eye, no significant background lighting

color:  both objects remained white throughout event

shape:  disc/circle

brightness/intensity:  objects brighter than jupiter, non blinking or pulsating, one object changed intensity slightly later on in the event

sound:  none

size:  both about 1.5 times jupiter's apparent diameter

objects' apparent motion (together)  both objects were initially in motion for about 1.5 minutes. their motion appeared as if 2 light bulbs were attached to the "multi axis trainer" used in astronaut training with one bulb on the framework of one axis and another bulb on the framework of the other axis. it appeared that they were revolving around an uncommon center in a loose elliptical path. both objects were moving in a clockwise direction but changed to a counterclockwise direction for a moment then returned to clockwise. there was no other interaction between the objects such as light sharing or arcing. 

objects apparent motion (separately)  after the initial 1.5 minute observation of motion, one object (disc #1) stopped its motion as if hovering and then the other object (disc #2) acceleratied in a ssw direction at an extremely high rate of speed until it was hidden by the trees marking the perimeter of the property. about 1 minute after object #2 was no longer visible, object #1 then accelerated from its hovering position in a sse direction at a similar rate of speed as object #2's object #2 displayed a slight increase in intensity as it was acceleration. after object #1 stopped, the remaining motions during the event were in apparent straight non curving lines.

residual effects (physical):  there were no vapor trails, however this would be difficult to observe since the moon had already set or was behind the trees and there were no significant background lighting

residual effects (personal): disc #1 stopped as i stood up from my chair, this made me feel somewhat like i was the one being observed.

local effects:  just prior to my initial observation, i heard about 5 dogs barking, my two up the driveway and 2 or 3 within a quarter mile. i couldn't determine if the other dogs were barking because mine were barking or if they were barking due to another stimulus that they had perceived.

time this report taken:  almost immediately after the event was over - 9:18

who took the report: the report was taken and written by my father, arthur constantino 6 possum glen road wwantage (sussex), new jersey (same property - different house). my father is a retired science teacher of 38 years. he is 62 years old and had retired in july 2007. for a short period of time, he was a field investigator for apro.

father's comments:  melissa and i have talked about ufo's on occassion with her having no real opinion as to whether they are intelligently controlled devices or not. she does not read ufo books and has shown marginal interest in ufo documentaries on tv. when she called from the deck to tell me what she saw, i came out and observed that she was shaken but was able to provide needed information to the specific questions that i proceeded to asked her. we went over the event several times and also communicated with her air force friend on the other end of the telephone. he was on the phone when the event was taking place. i have read many books on ufo's and have taught my students that suspended judgement is an important part of science until the facts present themselves enough to draw specific conclusions. 

note:  the closest airports are newark liberty international (nj), stewart international (ny).

follow-up:  i called the following police agencies to ask whether they had received any reports of ufo's within the above time frame.

vernon, nj police - the direction where the lights?Objects appeared
new jersey state police, augusta, n.J. - patrols wantage township and surrounding areas.

both agencies said that as of 9:40 that evening, there were no reports of ufo's. i did not persue atc.
content.summary: 2 objects moving around an uncommon center, one objects becomes stationary-other object accelerates away, then after 60 seconds, other objects departs in opposite direction

content.detailedDescription:
10:32 pm -almost deleted this video.  at the time it was taken, i had dismissed it as 'ours' because i heard a quiet engine noise.  playing with newly found x150 zoom and trying to unstick tripod, i really didn't pay attention to what i was filming at the time.  i can't see detail in the small lcd screen and usually wait to blow up footage to see what i have.

went to make room on hard drive and glad i viewed it, however, before deleting.  it is the same triangle ufo i filmed on august 4, 2009!  you can see it coming, a side view and changing into a "fake plane" ufo complete with it's non-faa flash pattern (both wing tip white lights are to strobe, not one side only).  also, although the light pattern is classic 'triangle' the shapes shown are not flat & a light pole is visible with holes in it's design.  i do believe it is probable that recent report from colorado indicating a 'bubble nose' is this same craft.

the video is in hd and too large to upload here.  see it and others on my youtube channel name:  seeingufospa

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=mzos7lk8_dw

the program i use for videos takes too much detail out of the stills, so here's some good shots for you here so others seeing these things have something to show people what they saw. 

p.S. your upload field should allow more than 3 so i can send more shots with varying views.
content.summary: Murrysville:  close up shots  of  triangular craft w/multi-colored lights

content.detailedDescription: Saw a strange aircraft from my home to the south-west then it moved to my south-east and turned from two into four lights and flashed several times before disapearing into thin air!? very scary, i have never seen anything like it. this was all spotted from 4 miles south-west of stephenville, texas. this all happened in about twenty minutes.
content.summary: Two lights repeatedly turned into four

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on route 44 towards my home and spotted what appeared to be 5 bright spotlights just over the trees approximately a quarter of a mile ahead. the area is residential and there are no street lights.  i continued driving toward the lights, past the turnoff to my road, because i was curious as to what this could be. my first reaction was that these were huge spotlights on a post such as you might see in a football stadium.  when i neared the lights i slowed the car to get a better view and realized the lights were on the front of a large rectangular grayish object that was hovering above the trees.  i stopped my car and rolled down the window to get a better view.  i estimate i was about 150 feet away. the object made no noise.  there were several white lights on the side, no wings,approximately 50-75 feet in length. i was astounded to say the least. several seconds after i stopped, the object sped away in a southeasterly direction and i noticed a red light on the back.  it was gone in an instant. there was no other traffic on the road at the time and the sky was clear. i was scared to say the least, and am totally perplexed.
content.summary: I spotted a gray rectangular domino like object with 5 spotlights on the front hovering above the trees on the side of the road.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my front yard, talking on the phone with my best friend.  it was approximately 11:30 pm and the night sky was absolutely clear and you could see hundreds of stars.  i noticed what i thought was a shooting star but it blinked, so then i thought it was some kind of aircraft.  i realized in just a second or two that there were three objects alike, in the same general area of the night sky.  all three were darting here and there, many times turning on a "dime".  more than once, making a 90 degree turn.  as they danced around a large portion of the sky, they would blink really quick, sometimes.  but not constant.  they seemed to almost be playing "tag".  their speed was phenomenal, and much faster than anything i am familiar with.  plus, they could change direction in a blink, and "we" have nothing that can do that, at that speed, to my knowledge.  i was describing all i was seeing to my buddy gary, and we were both trying to come up with an answer that made sense for what i was seeing.  i sometimes did not talk when he was asking me questions because i was entralled with what i was seeing.

about two or three minutes (maybe less) into watching this, they "zipped" away in different directions.  i kept talking with my buddy and kept watching the sky.  about four or five minutes later, i observed one of those same objects, heading north at an incredible speed.  behind it but far back was an obvious airplane, probably a military jet because of its speed, going in the same direction.  i had the impression that it was trying to catch or keep track of the "object" in front of it.  the airplane was going really really fast, but was "dusted" by the object in front of it, which seemed to be traveling at approximately 1 1/2 to 2 times the speed of the airplane.  they both disappeared to the north.

when i was observing these three objects in the beginning, they often would blink really quickly, a white light with no discernable colors, but would not constantly blink.  the blinking was very fast.  faster than helocopters or airplane lights blink.

but sometimes they would not blink for a second or two.  when they were not blinking, i could still make out an object in the direction of travel at any given moment, which appeared to be a dull grey or silver in color, streaking.

these objects were very high in the sky.  what i would describe as "outer space".  i can not explain how i could see them when they were not blinking, as there seemed to be no light other than that which blinked.  maybe it was a reflection from the moonlight that allowed me to see them.  i don't know.

i have never before observed something i could not explain, prior to this.  i served 8 years in the u.S. marine corps and 4 months in the navy.  i am 56 years old and a retired cleveland police officer.  i retired as a lieutenant, and i was recognized by the u.S. congress (108th congress) for my service and career.  my buddy who was on the phone with me at the time, is currently a working police officer in cleveland.

i have spend 24 hours or so, replaying in my mind and recollection, all of what i observed last night, and can not come up with a logical explanation.  i have told no one except my wife, who is visiting our son in texas, and my buddy gary.

i will add that in my area, we get a lot of military aircraft that conduct manuevers above our home.  there are usually two but sometimes three, always in the daylight hours, apparently practicing.  on one occasion, my wife and i actually observed one of the planes shoot an object, but we do not know what it was or where it went.  this shot object disappeared into some clouds.  every once in awhile these military aircraft break the sound barrier and rattle our home.  we just assume these military jets are from wright patterson afb, which is not to far from us.

oh, one more thing.  when i was observing the three unknown blinking objects, there was absolutely no sound.  when i observed the one streaking north, it was also silent but i could hear the loud coming airplane that was way behind it, going in the same direction.  my "feeling" is that the airplane was a lot lower in the sky, than the object it was following behind. 

i don't have anything else to add.  please let me know if you get any other reports from my area, during that same time period.

i am just amazed and confused.  i need glasses to read but my long range vision is very good.  i can not come up with a logical explanation for what i observed.
content.summary: Three objects with blinking lights in night sky.  super speeds and 90 degree turns.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear fall night in november or december while i was stargazing on the outskirts of pahrump at my house. i was sitting down in the middle of the backyard, looking in a south-southeasterly direction when i saw the craft out of the corner of my eye. it seemed to be a gray-ish boomerang that was thicker at the back curve and tapered thinner to the front. as it passed over i saw four blue jets that emmited no sound on the back. there were two of the jets on each side of the inside of the curve. 
as it moved further south at an altidue of maybe several thousand feet, flying slowly, the blue jets turned off in pairs. first the two outside jets and then the two inside jets, within 10-20 seconds of eachother. after that it became harder to watch it as it moved farther away and seemed to turn slightly east until fully disappearing. 
i didn't tell anyone about it until about a month later when i told one of my best-friends because i doubted anyone would believe me. he just chuckled and mocked my story a bit but didn't say anything else.
i think the craft could have been a test plane from area 51, as it was moving from that general direction.
content.summary: Boomerang-shaped object flying north to south

content.detailedDescription:
I was a passenger in a car moving approximately 65 mph shooting scenes through a closed side window. there is a possibility that the light is a reflection from the sun or an object speeding by. the shot was captured with a dslr sony alpha 100 with a 75-300 mm lens.

i noticed the object after shooting and viewing shots in the computer. 

i changed the color and light saturation in order to view the object with editing one shot to show the full picture and then changed views of the original.

when i saw the object, it looked like something streaming by.

i never saw the object while driving and shooting scenes of traffic and buildings in the miami area.
content.summary: Accidental sighting

content.detailedDescription: Took these 2 pictures not sure what is in them some objects one could be a bird not sure of the other objects. what do you think they are?
content.summary: Objects in rainbow photos.

content.detailedDescription: While working the late shift august 24th , 11 to 7 am i took a break to go outside after finishing the bulk of my work. i was smoking while looking up to the southeast sky i saw what i was sure was venus. it wasnt real bright but visible. i have been fooled by venus before so i took time to note the behavior. it seemed like a faint light moving slightly. much like venus does seem to do .. i stood for a minute to look at exactly the location and the behavior. after about 2 minutes i noticed what seemed like smaller light balls or orbs being projected from the larger light. i was certain that it was my eyes playing tricks. i stood behind a support column to see if i could line up the object to actually see if it was moving but it didnt help much. this light seemed to gain in intensity then fade. it did this a few times but it did seem to emit smaller lights and cast them  in different locations. if venus was in the southeast sky around 2 am early this morning i feel thats what it was , if not it could be something else..? i wasnt realy going to post this but i noticed the exact same discription of something seen from loveland ohio on aug 24th. it seems almost exactly like what i had seen.
content.summary: Light orb like which seemed to give off smaller light orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
Scanning the sky my son and i noticed what seemed to be a bright star but it was constantly changing color. we got the binoculars and could see it was a constant twinkling of red, green blue and white lights - it was stationary in the sky for about 45 minutes and then disappeard.

we were standing outside the front door of my home 
we noticed the object due to the brightness and unusual colors
we first thought it was a plane coming at us but it never moved 
we continued to observe the object - we flashed a laser at it and it seemed to cause the laser light to start pulsing.
we watched it for about 30 to 40 minutes went into the house for a minute came back out and it was gone
content.summary: Stationary in the sky too low for star multuple colors blue gree red
